job.title: Software Engineer Intern
job.description: RoleltbrgtltbrgtThe Software Engineer Intern will aid in gathering new neural network frozen graphs assembling data sets for each graph and helping to isolate various blocks within the graphs As part of these roles you will be expected to work with machine learning frameworks and associated tools You will be joining a small team in a dynamic startup environment where each member is expected to take on a wide range of responsibilities and to learn and grow with the companyltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtGather frozen graphs for opensource DNNs and associated data setsltligtltligtModify existing graphical tools to isolate various component subgraphsltligtltligtAid in lowering the subgraphs through our toolchain ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtPursuing a degree in Computer Engineering or Computer ScienceltligtltligtIllustrates a strong programming background with Python and JavascriptltligtltligtProficiency with version control software such as GitltligtltligtSelfdriven debugger who loves digging deeper to determine a root causeltbrgtltligtltulgtNice to havesltbrgtltulgtltligtExperience with Deep Neural NetworksltligtltligtExperience with ElectronltbrgtltligtltulgtExpected Outcomes in 4 monthsltbrgtltulgtltligtCollected 35 DNN frozen graphs and associated data setsltligtltligtDeveloped a graphical tool to isolate repeated subgraphsltligtltulgt
